CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordTypeId, "01250000000Hd58", "Renewal", "01250000000Hq3W", "Cancellation", IF( IsClosed, CASE(StageName, "Closed Won", "Closed Won", "Closed Lost", "Closed Lost", "Closed - No Decision", "Closed - No Decision", "Other Closed"), IF( ISPICKVAL(RFP2__c,"Funded"), IF( Probability = 0, "Not Interested Yet", IF( Probability < 0.45, "Shopping for a Solution", IF( Probability < 1.0, "Selected", "Probability Unknown" ) ) ), IF( Probability = 0, "Not Interested Yet", IF( Probability < 0.35, "Pre-Shopping", IF( Probability <1.0, "Shopping for a Solution", "Probability Unknown" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Buying Phase (Legacy)
